name: MEM: Ballad of Broken Melodies
description:
Follow Tibbar in his quest to remember the Lost Melody! 

Explore the world of MEM, beat the obstacles in your path with music. Unleash the magic in your instruments to find what you have been looking for, for a long, long time...
